flawed_nl_solution:
Jack had 13 more than 8 notebooks for a total of 13+8 = <<13+8=24>>24 notebooks
He gave 5 notebooks to Paula so he has 24-5 = <<24-5=19>>19 notebooks left
He gave another 6 to Mike so he has 19-6 = <<19-6=13>>13 notebooks left
#### 13

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21, not 24. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
